Interface_name: WebSocket Server based on Java EE
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a WebSocket server endpoint class in Java that handles client connections, text messages, and binary messages. The class should manage WebSocket sessions and echo received messages back to clients.

Class Description: The MyEndpoint class is a WebSocket server endpoint that listens for client connections on the "/websocket" path. It handles text and binary messages, providing echo functionality while logging connection and message details.

Attributes:
- None (All required session information is passed through method parameters)

Methods:
- onOpen: [onOpen](Session session) -> void - Handles new WebSocket connections and logs the client's request URI.
- echoText: [echoText](String data, boolean part) -> String - Handles incoming text messages, logs message details, and returns the same message (echo). The boolean parameter indicates if the message is complete or partial.
- echoBinary: [echoBinary](ByteBuffer data, Session session) -> void - Handles incoming binary messages, logs message details, and sends the same binary data back to the client (echo). Throws IOException if sending fails.
